response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which I believe could significantly enhance the efficiency and profitability of your operations. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its intrinsic value to be well above $1,500,000. However, to facilitate a transaction and cater to your specific needs, I am offering this exceptional product to you at an exclusive price of $1,800,000. This offer includes comprehensive support and customization options to ensure seamless integration into your existing systems. Please let me know if you would like to discuss further details or arrange a demonstration.", "product_price": 1800000}
